page.title: 18SCHOOL MEALS
page.content: BECAUSE I HAVE TO TRAVEL QUITE A DISTANCE TO SCHOOL WHEN IT IS LUNCHTIME I STAY AT SCHOOL TO EAT MY LUNCH. AS DO MOST OF THE OTHER CHILDREN WHO TRAVEL TO SCHOOL BY SCHOOL BUS. AT OUR SCHOOL WE HAVE A CHOICE OF EITHER BRINGING IN SANDWICHES TO EAT OR BUYING A SCHOOL DINNER. WHATEVER YOU CHOOSE TO DO FOOD HAS TO BE EATEN IN THE HALL. THE DINNERS AT OUR SCHOOL ARE VERY GOOD BECAUSE YOU CAN CHOOSE WHAT YOU WANT FROM QUITE A VARIETY OF FOODS. YESTERDAY I HAD BEEFBURGERS, CHIPS, CARROTS AND GRAVY. FOR PUDDING I HAD FRUIT FLAN AND CUSTARD. I COULD HAVE HAD STEAK AND KIDNEY PIE OR FISH FINGERS OR RAVIOLI ALL WITH A SELECTION OF VEGETABLES. WE ALSO HAVE A SALAD BAR WHERE THERE IS FRESH LETTUCE, TOMOTOES AND OTHER SALAD FOODS.
